title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: Upon reopening the hyperlink builder, the title is displayed as 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'. 2. Click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder.
